capability.name: Corporate Alliance And Stake Holder
capability.definition: This capability manages key alliance and stakeholder relationships by defining tasks needed to develop and maintain contact while ensuring relevant information is shared appropriately to support strategic corporate partnerships.
capability.role: Manage key alliance and stake holder relationship - define tasks needed to develop and maintain contact and ensure relevant information is shared as appropriate
capability.example: Corporate strategy is communicated and aligned with a product alliance partner

key_features.name: Alliance relationship management
key_features.description: Enables alliance relationship management to support this capability manages key alliance and stakeholder relationships by defining tasks needed to develop and maintain contact while ensuring relevant information is shared appropriately to support strategic corporate partnerships
